thread.title: WATCH || DeMarcus Cousins has advice for Quade Green
thread.title_full: WATCH || DeMarcus Cousins has advice for Quade Green

title: WATCH || DeMarcus Cousins has advice for Quade Green
text:
WATCH || DeMarcus Cousins has advice for Quade Green Former Wildcat DeMarcus Cousins has advice for future Kentucky point guard Quade Green. â€” Anthony Gilbert (@axgilbert) January 31, 2017 
In town to play the 76ers Monday night, Sacramento Kings All-Star big man and former Wildcat DeMarcus Cousins was asked to give advice to Philadelphia (Pa.) Neumann Goretti 5-star and future Kentucky point guard Quade Green . 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
"His eyes are about to be opened," Cousins told Anthony Gilbert of Slam Magazine. "That's probably the biggest stage in college basketball so you better be prepared coming in." 
Green (6-1, 177), who is ranked No. 23 overall and the No. 4 point guard in the 2017 class by the 247Sports Composite , committed to Kentucky and signed with coach John Calipari in November. 
He was recently named to both the McDonald's All-American Game and Jordan Brand Classic. 
Cousins said that the Calipari Green encountered during the recruiting process may not be the same coach he sees on the sideline next season. 
Everything may seem peachy now but Cal will be on your ass," Cousins said. "If you buy into the team concept, everybody is going to come out on top." 
Cousins, will make his third straight All-Star appearance in New Orleans next month, finished with 46 points, 15 rebounds and five assists in a 122-199 loss to the 76ers.
